courses.title: Beginner's Music Theory
courses.description: Understand the basics of notes, chords, and scales to build a strong musical foundation.

courses.title: Advanced Music Composition
courses.description: Learn to compose complex music arrangements and orchestrate like a pro.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Produce EDM tracks using modern tools like Ableton Live and FL Studio.

courses.title: Acoustic Guitar Essentials
courses.description: Master chords, strumming patterns, and fingerpicking on the acoustic guitar.

courses.title: Songwriting for Beginners
courses.description: Learn how to write lyrics, create melodies, and structure songs from scratch.

courses.title: Live Performance Mastery
courses.description: Boost your stage presence, confidence, and crowd engagement during live shows.

courses.title: Mixing & Mastering Essentials
courses.description: Understand EQ, compression, and audio processing to polish your tracks professionally.
